snippet: Giant Ryan, a 6-year-old Grade 1 stakes winner, fractured his left front leg during a race at Belmont Park.
abstract: Horse Racing Roundup; Giant Ryan, a 6-year-old Grade 1 stakes winner, fractures his left front leg during a race at Belmont Park; prognosis for the horse is grim.
lead_paragraph: Giant Ryan, a 6-year-old Grade 1 stakes winner, fractured his left front leg during a race at Belmont Park.

headline.seo: Giant Ryan, a Stakes Winner, Fractures His Leg
headline.main: Stakes Winner Fractures Leg at Belmont
